be worried because yesterday, tragedy
visited the heart of the city. A brutal,
despicable tragedy. A car exploded near
the Red Fort Metro metro station around
7:00 p.m. local time. It simply blew up.
Officials have identified the car since.
They have leads on the people inside.

there is no clarity on the motive. From

spotted across the national capital
region. At 7:30 a.m. yesterday, it was
seen in Faridabad. That's a city in Hana
bordering Delhi. Around 45 minutes
later, it was spotted entering Delhi.
After that, there was a time gap. We

there for nearly 3 hours. At 6:22 p.m.,

station.
So, the timeline is pretty clear. The
next question is, who was driving it?
All the suspicion is on this man right
now, a doctor from Pulwama named Omar
Muhammad. The police believe that he was
driving the car. Again, this is not

If so, this was not just a blast, it was

ammonium nitrate. On its own, this
chemical does not explode. But if you

explosive. And this is where the plot
